name: CUBE MANIA
description:
DO YOU LIKE ADVENTURE & ACTION, PARKOUR GAME!

 So this game is not for you. CUBE MANIA is Speed and Strategic Game.

CONTROLS:   A KEY  &  D KEY

A- LEFT 

D-RIGHT

CODING TUTORIALS:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCLdGsITOQlLU8SNjbg3i2A/featured?sub_confirmati...

INSTALL INSTRUCTION

WINDOWS

1) Download CUBE MANIA Installer 

2)Open Installer

3)Click on Yes

4)Then if you want Desktop Then check the box and click next

5)Click on Install

6) You are done with install

7)Open and click on START

8) Enjoy the Game
